QueryResult.text: SELECT r.id RESOURCE_ID, c.start_date DAILY_START_DATE, 0 AVAIL_HOURS FROM srm_resources r, rpt_calendar c WHERE r.resource_type <= 1 AND c.period_type = 'DAILY' UNION SELECT r.id RESOURCE_ID, s.slice_date DAILY_START_DATE, SUM(s.slice) AVAIL_HOURS FROM srm_resources r INNER JOIN prj_blb_slices s ON r.id = s.prj_object_id INNER JOIN prj_blb_slicerequests sr ON s.slice_request_id = sr.id WHERE (sr.request_name = 'DAILYRESOURCEAVAILCURVE') AND (r.resource_type <= 1) GROUP BY r.id, s.slice_date
